structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text:
As used in this chapter unless the context requires otherwise:
"Authority" means a local parking authority as created by KRS 67A.914.
"Commissioner" means a person appointed to serve on the governing body of a local parking authority.
"District" means an area designated by the ordinance creating, under the supervision of the local parking authority, a local parking district that is deemed to be specially benefited.
"Subdistrict" means a part of a district having a different degree of benefit from the remainder of the district.
"Local legislative body" means the governing body of any urban-county government whether it be designated as a city commission, city council or any other similar designation.
"Project" means any undertaking within or near a local parking district.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 10, effective June 19, 1976.
